title: Love's Look @ Ozark Life
description: A compendium of short stories providing a taste of Rolland Love's varied literary styles. His novels and short stories have received over 200 five star reviews. http://ozarkstories.com Short story titles: Fish Fry, Love is a Dogs Favorite Food, Death In A Cave, Hillbillies Are Smarter Than You Think! PARTS 1,2 & 3, Commentary on Social Networking, Buying Stuff, Growing up in the Ozark Mountains.
author: Rolland Love
